info.name: Glass about:blank with search engine
info.description:
I was tired of trying to glass about:blank so I made 1. http://glasshome.weebly.com/  (very simplistic plus added Google search engine)

I take no credit for the script just did some minor editing of this guy lottel. http://userstyles.org/users/40174 thnx ^^

to be used with "http://glasshome.weebly.com/" (as a home page)
tab mix plus add-on (to replace about:blank with homepage)
and any Glasser Firefox add-on port.
